start.welcome:
👋 Welcome to Rename & Scheduler Bot!

I help you rename captions/filenames and schedule your posts to your channels.

📋 Features:
• Rename caption/filename
• Schedule post sending

🎯 Commands:
/start - Show this message
/help - Show help and usage
/addchannel - Add a new channel (Name @username or just @username)
/settings - Open settings

🛠 Admin commands:
/addfsub - Add forced-subscription channels (admin)
/delfsub - Delete forced-subscription channels (admin)
/channels - List forced-subscription channels (admin)
/status - Bot status
